Name: Auditory oddball comparison (Optimum-1, Learning-oddball, and the local–global paradigm)
ReferencesAndLinks: Rutiku, R., Fiscone, C., Massimini, M., & Sarasso, S. (2024). Assessing mismatch negativity (MMN) and P3b within‐individual sensitivity — A comparison between the local–global paradigm and two specialized oddball sequences. European Journal of Neuroscience, 59(5), 842-859.
